text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump There are roughly 183,000 nurses in my state alone. When you actually do the math on all these 'single use' items you have a gigantic shortfall. Why would you tweet these numbers as something to be proud of?#TrumpLiesAmericansDie #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath #TrumpCoronaDisaster #COVID19
